mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user(user_id, name , address, email, age, sex, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{address}, #{email}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id AS userId, name AS name, address AS address, email AS email, age AS age, sex AS sex, create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime FROM t_user WHERE user_id = #{userId}
